snippet: The second-season premier of "The Killing'' attracted fewer viewers than its average for last year, and "Mad Men'' drew 2.9 million viewers, down from 3.5 million last week.
abstract: The second-season premier of "The Killing'' attracted fewer viewers than its average for last year, and "Mad Men'' drew 2.9 million viewers, down from 3.5 million last week.

headline.main: AMC Sunday Dramas Suffer Ratings Falloff
